newsitem.title: FRANCE: Air Mauritius to add extra flight.
newsitem.headline: Air Mauritius to add extra flight.

text.p: Air Mauritius said it will increase the number of weekly flights on its Airbus 340 passenger service between Paris-CDG and Mauritius from five to six later this year.
The extra weekly flight is scheduled to operate during the winter tourist season, between December 4 and January 29, an airline official said.

"The extra cargo capacity offered by the sixth weekly flight, around 15 tonnes, will be available during the Christmas/New Year period when demand for freight space is normally high so we hope to make good use of it," an official for Air Mauritius' French cargo sales agent, ATC, told Reuters. - Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax+44 171 542 5017
